ISSUE.TITLE: Dashboard issues
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi guys, I very excited about your work for refinement dashboard displaying and layout management in v4. Thank you! I found following little issues: - pivot table visualizations can't be scrolled now in widgets of dashboards. This is very inconvenient for wide or long pivot tables. In my fork of Redash I fixed it by commenting all lines in method this.getWidgetStyles in client/app/components/dashboards/widget.js - it seems that there was appeared some length-limit for dashboard page - I place more than 10 full-wide visualizations in one dashboard and can't make a correct place for last visualizations, they are overlapped. Thank you.
